messages.message: Hey team, I'm getting a `otel-cli: not found` error thats failing my cicd pr runs (https://jenkins.instabase.com/blue/organizations/jenkins/instabase/detail/PR-70823/5/pipeline/) after 3 minutes consistently. Any tips on how to resolve this?

:eyes:
That's a change of mine, I wonder why you have an old version of the pipeline coming in though :thonk:

Ooh weird, it's picking up at a later stage and thus bypassing the install

```12:14:25  [Pipeline] { (Install otel-cli)
12:14:27  Stage "Install otel-cli" skipped due to this build restarting at stage "Run CI tests on PR"```
@pauline.comising Are you explicitly restarting the job using the "Restart from Stage" link?

Ah yea looks like it

I'd recommend just rebuilding with the `Rebuild` or `Build Now` links, starting from a specific stage is fraught with lots of unpredictable behavior :sweat_smile:
Plus it only skips a few seconds worth of tasks in this case
